title: Trouble shooting your car
brief_description: What a driver should do to locate and correct minor car troubles; how to follow an orderly and step-by-step procedure in checking why a car won’t start; and how to recognise symptoms of impending trouble.
description: What a driver should do to locate and correct minor car troubles; how to follow an orderly and step-by-step procedure in checking why a car won’t start; and how to recognise symptoms of impending trouble.
